title: An introduction to Feminism (STUDENT SPECIAL)
description: In this episode, Matthew talks to Dr. Claire Sedgwick all about Feminism. Claire discusses the different waves of Feminism, the branches of Feminism, the key areas of focus and gives some top tips of key Feminist writers to read about in more detail.
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
